message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $160 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $150?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I believe we could reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would $130 be acceptable to you?
